title: Invalid Host Header parameter triggers Internal Server Error

labels.name: triage/upstream
labels.description: Used for issues which are caused by issues in upstream projects/dependency

body:
### Describe the bug


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11822359/197137559-683c70a4-2376-4fb7-883b-58238177c432.png)

```
URI.java:883 java.net.URI.createResteasyUriInfo.java:293
org.jboss.resteasy.specimpl.ResteasyUriInfo.getRequestUriClassNode.java:70
org.jboss.resteasy.core.registry.ClassNode.matchRootClassNode.java:47
org.jboss.resteasy.core.registry.RootClassNode.matchResourceMethodRegistry.java:480

org.jboss.resteasy.core.SynchronousDispatcher.preprocessSynchronousDispatcher.java:247

org.jboss.threads.ThreadLocalResettingRunnable.runFastThreadLocalRunnable.java:30

```

### Expected behavior

Maybe it works as expected, just wanted to point that out.
